item.description:
Right now I am looking at Real Estate Investing as my way to financial freedom. It is the way we can all thrive in the "new normal" because we have chosen to educate ourselves on RE Investing or really our financial education. We probably all share a common goal of being extraordinarily successful professionals. But we can’t do it alone. Your single most important success factor, second only to taking action, is having a Power Team that extends your reach, broadens your skills, and attracts new opportunities to you.

I am asking for suggestions, participation and involvement to get our respective years off to a great start. I saw this email come across this morning and chose to act on it! And now I feel empowered to get us together and growing.

I welcome your comments and suggestions!

Thanks

John Goodwin
john@legacyinvestmentgroup.biz
781-801-4849
item.why: We need to share our resources, talents and experience in 2011 Things are getting worse for traditional lending, so we need to be able to remain creative, think "win-win-win" transactions, and unashamedly make some money too! Are you with me??
item.name: Let's regroup and renew our efforts to make money in RE NOW! Come join us!
